channel.title: CVE Feed for Openfind -- Mail2000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openfind -- Mail2000

item.title: CVE-2020-12776|2024-08-04T12:04:22.909Z -- openfind -- mail2000
item.description: Openfind Mail2000 contains Broken Access Control vulnerability, which can be used to execute unauthorized commands after attackers obtain the administrator access token or cookie.
